mapper.select: select req_no reqNo, selSection, interval, notiTimes from notireq where prod_no = #{prodNo} and user_no = #{userNo} and viewDate = #{viewDate}
mapper.insert: insert into notireq values( seq_req_no.nextval, #{userNo}, #{prodNo}, #{viewDate}, #{selSection}, #{interval}, #{notiTimes}, sysdate, 1 )
mapper.delete: delete from notireq where prod_no = #{prodNo} and user_no = #{userNo} and viewDate = #{viewDate}
